urls.title: Innovative projects to protect against flooding selected
urls.description: Cutting-edge flood forecasting and natural flood management schemes trialled in 25 selected areas receiving a share of £150m to develop new flooding responses.

text:

@StinkStopthe @Kamron09 @EnvAgencyMids Well done to the protestors today. How ironic that right now the stink is back big time, all windows & doors firmly closed but still being polluted in our own homes. Do they turn a tap on at night to release the obnoxious gases when they think we won’t notice?
